description: Welcome to Thavonsouk Hotels & Resorts in Vangvieng. Thavonsouk is your Vang Vieng accommodation choice when you travel to Vang Vieng. Stay with Thavonsouk if you are in Vang Vieng. Thavonsouk Bungalow Resorts Hotels in Vang Vieng, which is riverside Resort & Hotel with the gorgeous view of the Phadeng (Red Cliff), green forest and sunset. Our resort hotel is your magnificent private holiday home, just 2 hour drive from Vientiane; the capital city of Laos and 5 hours down from Lungprabang, the World heritage town. Vang Vieng and surrounding areas offer unsurpassed natural wonders, still unspoiled...explore by yourself.
